img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 65.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e5/Wukong_Pagoda_65.jpg)
Head outside the cells slowly, and you can poke a Blade Monk on the outside off the ledge he's standing on the edge of.
img_below_text:
Then head to the cell on the right to find another Blade Monk guarding a **Treasure Chest** full of random materials. There's also a green Wisp just outside on the ledge.
![Wukong Pagoda 67.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d6/Wukong_Pagoda_67.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 63 from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 65.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e5/Wukong_Pagoda_65.jpg)
Head outside the cells slowly, and you can poke a Blade Monk on the outside off the ledge he's standing on the edge of."
            - Following Text: "Then head to the cell on the right to find another Blade Monk guarding a **Treasure Chest** full of random materials. There's also a green Wisp just outside on the ledge.
![Wukong Pagoda 67.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d6/Wukong_Pagoda_67.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the player character, Wukong, is inside a dimly lit, rocky cell area. Wukong is preparing to engage a Blade Monk, who is guarding a treasure chest filled with random materials. The highlighted area in the image indicates the location of the treasure chest. The preceding text advises players to move slowly outside the cells and deal with another Blade Monk, while the following text mentions another Blade Monk guarding a treasure chest and a green Wisp on the ledge outside.
